verses.name: Jeremiah 1:5
verses.text: Before I formed thee in the belly I knew thee; and before thou camest forth out of the womb I sanctified thee, and I ordained thee a prophet unto the nations.

verses.name: Jeremiah 1:6
verses.text: Then said I, Ah, Lord God! behold, I cannot speak: for I am a child.

verses.name: Jeremiah 1:7
verses.text: But the Lord said unto me, Say not, I am a child: for thou shalt go to all that I shall send thee, and whatsoever I command thee thou shalt speak.

verses.name: Jeremiah 1:8
verses.text: Be not afraid of their faces: for I am with thee to deliver thee, saith the Lord.
